articles.title: Yet Another Fantasy Title - Official Release Date Trailer - IGN
articles.description: Enjoy the release date trailer for Yet Another Fantasy Title, the upcoming open-world action-RPG parody game from the makers of Rustler (aka Grand Theft Horse) that pokes fun at all of the cliched fantasy-game tropes. It launches on PC on April 10.
